radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver demonstrates no focal lesion. The portal vein is patent and shows hepatopetal flow. The CBD measures between 6 and 7 mm. The gallbladder is contracted around multiple stones with US finding of wall echo shadow complex. The wall is mildly thickened, measuring 8 mm, likely related to chronic cholecystitis. Trace pericholecystic fluid is demonstrated. No sonographic Murphy's sign was elicited.
